mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM "ORDER" JOIN ORDER_PROD OP USING (ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PR USING (PROD_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY ORDER_NO ASC
SELECT * FROM "ORDER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY ORDER_NO ASC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, C.COUPON_NO, TO_CHAR(validity_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as validity_date, status, C.COUPON_NAME, C.DISCOUNT_RATE, C.DISCOUNT FROM COUPON_USER CU JOIN COUPON C ON (CU.COUPON_NO = C.COUPON_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND VALIDITY_DATE > SYSDATE

SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, PROD_NAME, SIZE, COLOR_NAME, COUNT, ORDER_NAME FROM ORDER_PROD OP LEFT JOIN ORDER USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT USING (PROD_NO) LEFT JOIN PROD_DETAIL PD ON (OP.PROD_NO = PD.PROD_NO) AND (OP.INDEX = PD.INDEX) LEFT JOIN PALETTE PAL ON (PD.COLOR_NO = PAL.COLOR_NO) WHERE ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate}
SELECT * FROM "ORDER" LEFT JOIN ORDER_PROD USING ORDER_NO WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
